name: World of Warships: Legends - Pocket Battleship
name_original: World of Warships: Legends - Pocket Battleship
description:
The infamous "pocket battleship" of the German Navy—Graf Spee! This cruiser has six 283 mm guns and two quad-tube torpedo launchers, which means she has no issues dealing massive damage. You'll get Graf Spee with a week of Premium time, camos, doubloons, Commander XP, and Commander XP boosters!

This bundle contains: - Graf Spee Tier V ship - 7 Premium days - 10 Type 1 Camo - 300 Doubloons - 37,000 Commander XP - Bonus: 10 Rare Commander XP Boosters
